articles.title: "I Miss The Sun": Australian Journalist Jailed In China - NDTV
articles.description: Jailed Australian journalist Cheng Lei yearns for her children and the country's "psychedelic sunsets", she said in a rare public letter marking three years since her mysterious arrest in China.
articles.content:
Cheng Lei was detained at a time of rising tensions between China and Australia.
